validations.field-error_email: Field must be a valid email
validations.field-error_ethAddress: Field must be a valid ethereum address
validations.field-error_minLength: Field must be at least {length} characters long
validations.field-error_maxLength: Field must be at most {length} characters long
validations.field-error_sameAs: Field must be the same as {field}

errors.provider-unauthorized: The requested method and/or account has not been authorized by the user.
errors.provider-unsupported-method: The Provider does not support the requested method.
errors.provider-disconnected: The Provider is disconnected from all chains.
errors.provider-chain-disconnected: The Provider is not connected to the requested chain.
errors.provider-invalid-request: JSON is not a valid request object standard
errors.provider-json-rpc-version-not-supported: Version of JSON-RPC protocol is not supported non-standard
errors.provider-wrapper-method-not-found: provider not exist or hasn't this method
errors.errors-loading-error: Error loading errors, please reload page

notification.default-message-warning: Something you are doing is not recommended
notification.default-message-info: Something is happening. Just want you to know that
notification.tx-pending-message: Your transaction in progress, please wait until it will be mined

metadata-tooltips.distribution-borrow-apy: Represents the additional reward APY for borrower.
metadata-tooltips.utilization-ratio: Liquidity pool utilization ratio demonstrates the percentage of pool asset distributed as loans to the whole pool size.
metadata-tooltips.collateralization-ratio: The ratio that compares the value of the loan to the collateral amount: Collateralization Ratio = Loan Amount / Collateral Value
metadata-tooltips.liquidation-discount: Discount on collateral asset to be received by liquidator for repaying undercolletarised loan on behalf of the initial borrower.
metadata-tooltips.max-utilization-ratio: Maximum liquidity pool utilization is a ratio of the maximum amount of loans possible to take from the pool.
metadata-tooltips.reserve-factor: Interest payment paid from each loan to the platform.
metadata-tooltips.used-as-collateral: This asset is available to be used as a collateral for loans.
metadata-tooltips.distribution-supply-apy: Represents the additional reward APY for supplier.
metadata-tooltips.borrow-limit: Maximum borrow limit available to the particular user.

api-errors.session-expired-desc: Please login again to continue using the application.

file-field.incorrect-file-type-err: You cannot upload a {{type}} file. Allowed types: {{allowedTypes}}
file-field.max-size-exceeded-err: You cannot upload a file exceeding {{maxSize}} MB
